stories.text:
Hi HN. I'm a co-founder at a startup that is 9+ years old. Business metrics are solid, raised series C recently and have plans for IPO in the next 3-4 years. My goal has always been financial independence and to achieve that I'm looking to sell about 30% of my shares.

I've looked at possible options and got intrigued by secondary market platforms like Equity Zen and Forge Global. Has anyone here used these platforms? What was your experience like? Any advice?

For the context, I'm not an exec at the company. Action is in UK.

P.S. Sorry to post under anonymous account.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's your experience selling shares with Equity Zen or Forge Global?
